People are always coming up with Bitcoin analogs ("digital gold")  But IMO, Bitcoin = digital alcohol.  Alcohol is a way of turning a thing that rots (fruit, grain) into something permanent and transportable (wine, whiskey). Bitcoin, theoretically, does the same with electricity.
